unnormalised: The Income Tax Dept. has extended the deadline for linking PAN with Aadhaar till June 30th, giving folks a little more breathing room. If you don't link by then, your PAN will become inoperative! Crazy, right? Better get on it, bhai!
normalised: The Income Tax D-e-p-t. has extended the deadline for linking P-A-N with Aadhaar till June thirtieth, giving folks a little more breathing room. If you do not link by then, your P-A-N will become inoperative! Crazy, right? Better get on it, bhai!

unnormalised: Apparently, lots of people were facing issues, and the govt. decided to give a final extension. Don't take it lightly, or you might face problems with your ITR filing next time. Imagine having to pay more taxes because your PAN isn't linked! Nobody wants that, yaar.
normalised: Apparently, lots of people were facing issues, and the govt. decided to give a final extension. Do not take it lightly, or you might face problems with your I-T-R filing next time. Imagine having to pay more taxes because your P-A-N is not linked! Nobody wants that, yaar.

unnormalised: For businesses, make sure your GSTIN is updated and linked with the correct PAN. A mismatch can cause serious headaches with claiming input tax credit. Also, keep your TAN handy when making TDS payments. A small mistake there can lead to big penalties. So, double-check everything and avoid last-minute hassles!
normalised: For businesses, make sure your G-S-T-I-N is updated and linked with the correct P-A-N. A mismatch can cause serious headaches with claiming input tax credit. Also, keep your T-A-N handy when making T-D-S payments. A small mistake there can lead to big penalties. So, double-check everything and avoid last-minute hassles!
